products.description: Deco grained fauxwood is a range of fantastic grained wooden blinds that will make your space look great. This slatted wooden blind will add elegance and character to any room. Mirage is a classic cream colour, cool and contemporary in shade & style. products.title: Ecowood, Vanilla Kiss Satin - Venetian Blind
products.description: The smooth and silky finish of the ecowood in vanilla kiss satin makes for a lush and refreshing look. The delicate colour plus the durable functionality makes a winning combination, blending style and durability with ease which is what every modern home needs. Insert the vanilla kiss satin into a bright and breezy french-style kitchen, surrounding it with similar vanilla creams, soft whites, and palest pastels.

products.title: Ecowood, Vanilla Kiss Fine Grain - Venetian Blind
products.description: The ecowood in vanilla kiss fine grain has all the charm of a painted blind, combined with the authentic feel of a real wood blind. Made from a realistic faux wood, this is a durable and hardwearing piece that will stand the test of time and the moistness of your bathroom. Use the vanilla kiss fine grain in the bathroom or kitchen along with an understated wood and cream colour scheme. Go for wood paneling or units, along with matching cream walls and accessories.

products.title: Spectrum, Space Blue - Venetian Blind
products.description: The spectrum range's space blue is a classic, bold blue, on a delightfully smooth, satin-finish aluminium. Fully adjustable slats sit neatly, and can be easily manoeuvred to control the amount of light that is let into the room. Enhance a cool blue child's room by placing the space blue against pale blue walls or patterned wallpaper, pairing with white furniture, and accenting with playful primary colours.

products.title: Spectrum, Lima - Venetian Blind
products.description: Let the natural apple green of the spectrum lima light up your home. The lightweight feel, yet sturdy quality, aluminium slats sit neatly and adjust easily, adding workability and function to style and aesthetics in this pretty blind. The muted green of the lima will match browns and creams in equal measure, and can even sit pretty amongst darker forest greens. Use for a lovely, colourful style in the living room, as a standout window feature in the dining room, or as part of a tranquil, calming scheme in the home office.

products.title: Spectrum, Casablanca - Venetian Blind
products.description: The spectrum casablanca comes with just a hint of fruity orange, making it stand out from other shades of yellow. A shiny, gloss finished blind, it comprises of heavy gauge aluminium slats, alongside coordinating cords and rails. The colour-blocking trend doesn't seem to be going away, so take advantage and use the casablanca against bright sky blues, emerald greens, or stark whites in a den, playroom, or dining room.

products.title: Spectrum, Picton Blue - Venetian Blind
products.description: If you love blue in all its shades, but are looking for that perfect sky blue, look no further, because we've found it. The spectrum in picton blue is sweet blue that feels as if it's been grabbed directly from the sky, and matching rails and pull-cords streamline the look. The pretty, outdoorsy feel of the picton blue makes this the perfect choice for a light and airy kitchen, where you can recreate a sky-like feel by adding in whites and paler blues.

products.title: Spectrum, Solitaire - Venetian Blind
products.description: The spectrum in solitaire brings a barely-there cream with hints of pink or peach, proving that plain doesn't necessarily mean plain. The satin-finish aluminium is strong and durable, and most importantly, guaranteed not to sag. This wipe-clean blind is perfect for a bathroom or kitchen, and the subtle shade will be beautifully complemented by richer peaches or darker pinks, with silver accents providing the finishing touches.

products.title: Spectrum, Magic Mint - Venetian Blind
products.description: The spectrum in magic mint offers contemporary style and a beautiful spearmint hue that will suit clean, airy rooms. The satin-finish aluminium is durable and lasting, with matching pull-cords and rails resulting in pure, uninterrupted colour. Offset mocha browns and soft taupes by placing the magic mint in the home office amidst light woods and white soft furnishings for a serene, relaxing feel.

products.title: Spectrum, Christine - Venetian Blind
products.description: Add a hint of citrus to a dim window with the spectrum in christine. This fun, vibrant blind has a satin finish and neatly sitting aluminium slats that can be tilted or moved using matching cords according to how much light you would like in the room. Make the christine pop by hanging in a white kitchen or utility room, with colour-coordinated orange and contrasting lime accessories to bring out the gorgeous orange hue.

products.title: Spectrum, Pickled Bluewood - Venetian Blind
products.description: The darkest of blues is blended with a muted, understated elegance, resulting in the pickled bluewood from the spectrum collection. This smooth, satin-finish aluminium blind has horizontal slats that are easily manoeuvrable using the colour-coordinated pull-cords. Keep light disturbances out in the den or home office with the cool pickled bluewood hanging pleasantly in the window, coupled with light greys and chevron patterning.

products.title: Spectrum, Gossip - Venetian Blind
products.description: The spectrum's gossip is a funky lime green with a gloss finish that adds shine and class to the heavy gauge aluminium. The lime shade offers fun and vivacity, making this a bold and colourful choice. The gossip's bright hue will complement stark whites and other citrus shades, the perfect colour scheme for a teenager's bedroom or the home office. Alternatively, use as a complement to a monochromatic dcor scheme, to add a pop of colour in a black and white dining room or bathroom.

products.title: Spectrum, Mill Brook - Venetian Blind
products.description: Creamy and luxurious, yet not overpowering, spectrum's millbrook is a delicious shade of brown. Its discreet satin finish only serves to promote this look, and this blind will look simply gorgeous with the slats adjusted either up or down. Give your home office an opulent feel that is also relaxing and unobtrusive, by placing against cream or pale taupe walls, and accessorising with the occasional splashes of soft aqua and pale gold.

products.title: Spectrum, Energy Yellow - Venetian Blind
products.description: When it comes to the spectrum's energy yellow, the name really does say it all. A bright, bold, and lively shade of yellow that simply refuses to be missed, this gloss finish, aluminium slatted blind is sure to make a statement wherever it's used. Add fun and cheer to a child's bedroom, where the energy yellow will work hard to pull out complementary colours from playful patterned wallpapers and primary coloured furniture.

products.title: Spectrum, Matt Black - Venetian Blind
products.description: Dark and matte, the spectrum in matt black is a sturdy, aluminium venetian blind that will add bold, contemporary style wherever it's placed. The metal slats are high quality and hardwearing, resulting in a blind that will last year upon year. An integral part of any monochromatic colour scheme, the matt black is perfectly complemented by light and dark greys, and dazzling whites. Feel free to liven the dcor up with bright limes or hot pinks, creating striking colour schemes in bedrooms, lounges, and kitchens alike.

products.title: Spectrum, Light Wisteria - Venetian Blind
products.description: Add a rosy glow to your home with the spectrum in light wisteria, a pretty, subtle shade of purple with a dusky hue and satin finish. Easily adjustable slats and simple to use pull-cords mean that you can enjoy true practicality in combination with style. A gorgeous shade for either a guest or master bedroom, the light wisteria looks best paired with dainty florals and soft creams, and can be offset beautifully by plush soft furnishings and light and medium coloured woods.

products.title: Spectrum, Thunderbird - Venetian Blind
products.description: A bold, vivid red and a gloss-finish, sturdy aluminium unite to form the spectrum thunderbird, a vibrant and lively venetian blind. The durable slats can be moved up and down, or gently tilted, to suit your needs, and come with a matching pull-cord and rails. The thunderbird will create a modern and animated vibe when paired with stark whites and accenting red accessories in a contemporary living room or dining room.

products.title: Spectrum, Fuscous Grey - Venetian Blind
products.description: The spectrum in fuscous grey is a blind designed to create an industrial or utilitarian feel in any modern home. A sturdy aluminium material, the glossy finish, and the cool, bold grey, combine to create a statement blind that is sure to catch the eye. Surround the fuscous grey with blacks, silvers, and whites for a modern monochrome colour scheme, scattering with the occasional bright yellow or bold orange.

products.title: Origin, Ultramarine - Venetian Blind
products.description: The origin ultra marine is a stand-out blue blind, with a gloss finish on strong aluminium slats. Made from only high quality materials, from the slats right through to the pull-cords, this blind is made for durability and hardiness. Take your bathroom to the seaside by coupling with pale, icy blues and pure, bright whites; or give a plain, neutral hallway or utility room a big splash of dazzling colour, offset by whites and silvers in ornaments, frames, and fittings.

products.title: Spectrum, Peach White - Venetian Blind
products.description: A pretty, delicate shade of cream, the spectrum in peach white has a subtle hint of, you guessed it, peach hue. The dainty colour of this blind does little to betray the strength and durability of the materials used, with its heavy gauge aluminium slats that will never sag. The peach white will harmonise beautifully with true colour peaches and apricots, to create a wonderfully sophisticated and unusual colour scheme in a living room or bedroom.

products.title: Origin, Matt Red - Venetian Blind
products.description: Brilliantly bold, the origin in matt red will inject life and colour into even the dullest of rooms. The satin-finish slats are made from heavy gauge aluminium, which can be adjusted to your liking using the coordinating cords. You'll love the effect the matt red has on an all-white contemporary kitchen, where it can be beautifully complemented by silver fixtures and fittings such as taps, cupboard handles, and the like.

products.title: Spectrum, Gloss White - Venetian Blind
products.description: The shiny gloss finish of the spectrum's gloss white shows off the quality of its heavy gauge aluminium slats, and comes with matching rails as well as pull-cords, which allow you to control the light coming into the room with ease. For a sheen to match the finish of a high quality suite, use in the bathroom amongst white floor and wall tiling. Then use a bold accent colour, such as cerise or orange, to add a pop of colour, which you can change at will.

products.title: Spectrum, Gull Grey - Venetian Blind
products.description: The spectrum's gull grey is a mid-grey, satin-finish blind, comprised of high quality aluminium slats that can be adjusted to allow the light in with ease, making it both functional and stylish to suit your every need. Using the gull grey in the home office will help you to create a pale, monochrome colour scheme, by omitting traditional black and going for greys and whites instead. If it's colour that you love, add in a sunny yellow or a sky blue as a brighter accent.

products.title: Origin, Mocha - Venetian Blind
products.description: Creamy and rich, the satin-finish origin mocha is a luxury-lover's dream. Work the adjustable slats to your heart's content, either to let the light in or keep it out, without worrying about over-use, as this durable aluminium blind is built to last. Streamline your kitchen by taking advantage of the mocha's colour-coordinated slats, cords, and rails, and pair with deeper browns or pretty turquoises to craft a refreshing and inspiring colour scheme that your guests won't be able to resist commenting on.

products.title: Spectrum, Zombie - Venetian Blind
products.description: With a unique name to match an equally unique hue, the spectrum zombie offers a cappuccino beige with a discreet satin finish, and blends it beautifully with deceptively sturdy slats, which are formed from a heavy gauge aluminium and complemented by matching fittings. Mix the zombie with navy blues in the home office, for a cool, contemporary feel that will get you working hard in no time. Or make this blind a feature all its own by setting it against off-white walls and accenting with pretty golds.

products.title: Spectrum, White China - Venetian Blind
products.description: A soft, off-white, with a subtle satin finish, the spectrum in white china is pretty and discreet in appearance, yet strong and durable in functionality, due to its heavy gauge aluminium slats, and high quality fittings in the form of matching pull-cords and rails. Integrate the white china into a calming pastel colour palette in your home office, where you can combine a cool aesthetic with workable practicality.

products.title: Ecowood, Chenille Fine Grain - Venetian Blind
products.description: The creamy, off-white chenille fine grain, from the hardwearing ecowood range, is light and relaxed, ensuring that it will match a range of decor schemes. This durable, pvc blind is quick and simple to install, freeing up your time to sit and enjoy it. Enhance a daring, tropical purple feature wall in a teenager's bedroom by hanging the chenille fine grain against it, using glossy and glistening silvers as accents.

products.title: Ecowood, Absolute White Satin - Venetian Blind
products.description: Silky smooth, as its name suggests, the ecowood in absolute white satin has a beautifully untextured finish and the icy white is clean and refreshing. Wide slats form the main structure of this blind, easily adjustable for light, air, and privacy versatility. Enhance the pure, fresh white of the absolute white satin and pit it against an equally clean-toned mint green for a calming yet energising ambience in the kitchen.

products.title: Ecowood, Castle Grey Satin - Venetian Blind
products.description: The ecowood in castle grey satin offers a subtle grey shade with a silky satin finish. Made from high quality faux wood, designed to withstand moist conditions, this blind has the full package: style, durability, and functionality. Take advantage of the range's suitability to any environment and use it as part of a monochrome bathroom scheme. Go for black and white tiling, a white suite, and black and grey accessories.

products.title: Ecowood, Pistachio Shell Satin - Venetian Blind
products.description: The ecowood in pistachio shell satin displays a pale, creamy biscuit with a silky satin finish, on a strong and sturdy slatted blind. Built to withstand moist conditions, and easily adjustable, this blind offers everything a window could need - and more. Use the pistachio shell satin to tone down a brightly coloured wall in a living room or bedroom. This creamy tone will match rich shades such as chocolate browns, plum purples, and burgundy reds.

products.title: Ecowood, Penthouse Satin - Venetian Blind
products.description: True to its name, the ecowood in penthouse satin offers the look and feel of true penthouse luxury. A soft, creamy caramel, with the smoothest of textures, it offers an understated style that is often so hard to achieve. Not anymore. Use the penthouse satin in a contemporary bedroom, where creams, coffees, and golds rule the roost. Add in plenty of plush fabrics to provide a feeling of luxe and comfort, using coffee browns and glistening golds as light accents around the room.

products.title: Ecowood, Devon Cream Satin - Venetian Blind
products.description: The flawless finish of the ecowood in devon cream satin is given by the satin-matt cream paint used to coat the hardwearing faux wood slats. For adjustable light, ventilation, and privacy, simply move and tilt the slats to suit your needs. Insert the devon cream satin into a natural and light decor scheme, furnishing the room with bare and painted wickers, unfinished woods, and organic hessians. Paint the walls in cream or oatmeal and include a large jute rug for added rural flair.
